question: Analyze the social media engagement of technology companies in the healthcare industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all technology companies operating in the healthcare industry and gather their profiles including revenue, market capitalization, and active status.
Retrieve social media engagement metrics from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube for the identified healthcare technology companies.
Aggregate the engagement metrics to compare the performance of these companies on social media platforms and identify trends.
Analyze the influence of the firms in terms of their historical engagement data to ascertain which companies are driving conversations in the healthcare sector.
